attributes.title: Extremely helpful information about POTUS
attributes.review: Honestly itâ€™s disappointing to see so many Americans blinded by the current POTUS and his malicious ways. Heâ€™s a misogynistic, homophobic, racist, egotistic, immoral, idiot. He sexualizes women, even if itâ€™s his own daughter. I refuse to contribute to his support. He has handled this pandemic horribly and blames it on other countries, instead of taking care of his own. All he honestly cares about is his fame, money, and same class colleagues. Heâ€™s slowly losing supporters, and to that I thank God. I do not wish to see him another 4 years taking this country down with him. This app is the worst possible thing you could download. Most trump supporters are immature and as you can see below this app, they even created an app to characterize themselves as trump and beat up the competition. I personally think this app is trash, just like our president. Thank you for reading :)

attributes.title: Bee movie
attributes.review:
e Movie Script - Dialogue Transcript

  
According to all known laws
of aviation,

  
there is no way a bee
should be able to fly.

  
Its wings are too small to get
its fat little body off the ground.

  
The bee, of course, flies anyway

  
because bees don't care
what humans think is impossible.

  
Yellow, black. Yellow, black.
Yellow, black. Yellow, black.

  
Ooh, black and yellow!
Let's shake it up a little.

  
Barry! Breakfast is ready!

  
Ooming!

  
Hang on a second.

  
Hello?

  
- Barry?
- Adam?

  
- Oan you believe this is happening?
- I can't. I'll pick you up.

  
Looking sharp.

  
Use the stairs. Your father
paid good money for those.

  
Sorry. I'm excited.

  
Here's the graduate.
We're very proud of you, son.

  
A perfect report card, all B's.

  
Very proud.

  
Ma! I got a thing going here.

  
- You got lint on your fuzz.
- Ow! That's me!

  
- Wave to us! We'll be in row 118,000.
- Bye!

  
Barry, I told you,
stop flying in the house!

  
- Hey, Adam.
- Hey, Barry.

  
- Is that fuzz gel?
- A little. Special day, graduation.

  
Never thought I'd make it.

  
Three days grade school,
three days high school.

  
Those were awkward.

  
Three days college. I'm glad I took
a day and hitchhiked around the hive.

  
You did come back different.

  
- Hi, Barry.
- Artie, growing a mustache? Looks good.

  
- Hear about Frankie?
- Yeah.

attributes.title: Worst app ever
attributes.review: I got this app to see trumps plans and keep up to date with everything. Right when I opened bunker boys app a terrible picture of bunker boy and the flag behind him terrified me. The app asked for my phone number that just gives me obnoxious spam on bunker boys merch. To be honest I find the text messages so sad and desperate to buy his hideous merch. I signed all in the app and it asked me to share the link to people; as if! I went on to explore the app and let me just say itâ€™s terrible! The loading symbol is a T for trump and I just find it self centered. This app only provides the republican side which I totally think is a terrible idea. This app should show both sides but whateverğŸ¤·ğŸ»‍â™€ï¸ if u can get past this terrible app that is ran by a terrible man, the terrible information on there, the SPAM, and overall a stupid app! Then I totally recommend this for u.

attributes.title: Oh my god this app
attributes.review: This app has ruined my life, itâ€™s has somehow made me want to die even more. I opened it I was terrified, I saw this man, hell I think it was a man, staring at me through my screen.. I swear I could feel him behind me.. then when I took a deeper look at this app and this scary â€œmanâ€ I just about puked! Apparently he doesnâ€™t like the lgbtq+ people and he doesnâ€™t think they should have health care!? He also doesnâ€™t like women or children very much.. well he might just like children a little too much if you catch my drift.....  I feel bad for Obama, I hope he can still do something about this.. also is itâ€™s true the Mike Pence is a homosexual? I saw this floating around and I donâ€™t think that it is just a rumor.. well anyway I need to get back to voting for Kanye, hanging my pride flags, and deleting Twitter from my phone. Thank you very much for reading this!

attributes.title: Worst App I Have Ever Seen
attributes.review: This app is absolute garbage. It took forever to download, I almost had to throw my phone away due to the clogging up of my data while trying to get it downloaded. The graphics are hideous, it is like a newborn chimpanzee was doing a self portrait with its own feces. There was a high pitched mosquito buzzing sound that happened the entire time it was on my phone. It made me feel like my ears were going to start bleeding at any moment until I got rid of it. Also I think it put radioactive spyware into my brain through the cell phone waves??? I feel like Iâ€™m being watched all the time now and it feels like there are bugs crawling on my brain- and it started as soon as the app completed its download. Absolute nightmare of an app. Would give 0 stars if I could. Donâ€™t put yourself through the trauma I went through. STAY AWAY!!!!
